en_title: Secretary for Justice to visit London

en: The Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, will visit London from October 13 to 15 to promote Hong Kong's status as an international legal and dispute resolution services centre at the London Law Expo 2014.
Mr Yuen will deliver a keynote speech at the Expo in the morning of October 14 to introduce Hong Kong's legal and arbitration services to the Expo's participants.

Apart from attending the Expo, Mr Yuen will also deliver a speech at a luncheon organised by the Hong Kong Association on October 14, and attend a seminar on Hong Kong's constitutional reform and the rule of law organised by Chatham House on October 15.
Mr Yuen will return to Hong Kong on October 16.
zh: 律政司司長袁國強資深大律師將於十月十三日至十五日訪問倫敦，並出席二○一四年倫敦法律博覽會，推介香港作為國際法律及解決爭議服務中心的地位。
袁國強將於十月十四日上午在博覽會發表演說，向與會者介紹香港的法律及仲裁服務。
除了出席倫敦法律博覽會，袁國強亦會於十月十四日在香港工商協會主辦的午餐會上致辭，及於十月十五日出席查塔姆研究所舉辦的研討會，討論香港的政改和法治。
袁國強將於十月十六日返抵香港。
